text: @realDonaldTrump (1/2)They started this covid-19 thing, then tried to blame it on china. The ex-cia guy gave the go ahead when he did the interview during the impeachment trial by the house “, when he said and I paraphrase, “to the people in the intelligence community, go ahead and do your duty.”
